name: Family Circuit '91
overview: Family Circuit '91 is a follow-up to the racing game Family Circuit. Like the previous game, it offers plenty of customizable options for the player to take account of. Players have the options of setting the color of the car, can tune the engine to their liking, can adjust the car's transmission, suspension, brake, and steering settings, set the angle of the wing, and choose the softness or hardness of the tires. The game also features 24 different tracks from around the world to race on.
